candidates.name: Jamie Cleine
candidates.why_elect: I keep an open mind to options but am willing to assess information and make decisions. I regularly speak at Council meetings and often bring a common sense approach to the topic. I maintain a great working relationship across the organisation and am committed to being transparent and accountable.
candidates.why_stand: I believe BDC has really turned a corner in terms of positive direction of the organisation and this is starting to reflect on the District. This is still in its early stages and I want to be a part of continuing this new way of doing business.

candidates.name: Charlie Bruning
candidates.why_elect: I am Buller born and bred and have lived here all my life, I offer sound leadership skills, with 26 years of experience as Westport's only practising Judicial Justice of the Peace, with good negotiating skills, I have studied Crime, Justice and Society, International Affairs on Globalisation, and Global Tourism.
candidates.why_stand: I have a vision that will take the Buller District forward to 2050 and beyond as a sustainable and vibrant community.
